response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the most demanding standards. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, as it represents years of innovation and dedication to quality. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $2,000,000. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this opportunity further.", "product_price": 2000000}
